alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wadena and east central Otter Tail Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 519 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bluffton, or 38 miles southeast of Detroit Lakes, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wadena, Menahga, Sebeka, Verndale, Deer Creek, Bluffton and Blue Grass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for central and west central Minnesota.
